Text: My firewall doesn't seem to be working right. Does anyone have the ip's for Kalypso so I can add to my hosts file?
Works perfectly. If the firewall doesn't block it, just disable the internet connection (what i do).

Does anyone have crack for version 1.3 (release date about 2010-12-17)? 
It could be great, because this version fixs many bugs. Download page for pure patch e.g. http://games.softpedia.com/get/Patch/Patrician-IV-Patch.shtml.
